data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lu, Lin, Zhang, Yalin (2011): New tribal placement for the leafhopper genus Evinus Dlabola (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae), with description of a new species from China. Zootaxa 2794: 52-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.277012
